properties.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 6:46PM CST until January 5 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
...From the National Weather Service in Little Rock...the Flood
Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas...

Cache River Near Patterson affecting Jackson and Woodruff Counties


...From the National Weather Service in Little Rock...the Flood
Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas...

White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties


River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall
forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of
flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall
forecasts.

Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our
Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at...
www.weather.gov/lzk
Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River At Augusta.
* until Sunday afternoon...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  5:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 27.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Saturday morning.



Fld     Observed        Forecast 6 AM        Crest
Location     Stg   Stg  Day Time   Wed   Thu   Fri  Crest Time  Date

Lower White River
Augusta     26  27.3 Tue 05 PM  27.0  26.8  26.5      Falling
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Remember to Turn Around...Don't Drown
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.

Everyone with property or other interest along streams and rivers
should remain alert to changing weather forecasts. Should conditions
change...Look for river forecasts or Flood Warnings for use in making
informed decisions to protect life and property.
